thread.title: House Intelligence Committee to hold first public hearing on Russia probe on March 20
thread.title_full: House Intelligence Committee to hold first public hearing on Russia probe on March 20

title: House Intelligence Committee to hold first public hearing on Russia probe on March 20
text:
Breaking News SHARES 
The House Intelligence Committee will hold its first public hearing this month on the ongoing investigation into Russia's influence on the 2016 election. 
The committee's chairman, Rep. Devin Nunes, R-Calif., said it will take place on March 20. 
FBI Director James Comey, National Security Agency Director Mike Rogers, former CIA Director John Brennan, former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper will all be invited. 
This story is developing. Please check back for further updates. 
Click here for the latest on the markets.
